updates.title: OpenAI launches Atlas, an AI-powered browser that lets users navigate the web using natural language commands, sparking new browser wars with Microsoft quickly following with similar Copilot Mode features in Edge.

ChatGPT now integrates directly with major design and creative apps including Figma, Canva, and Spotify, allowing users to control these platforms through natural language commands within the ChatGPT interface.

OpenAI acquires Sky (Software Applications Inc.), an AI-powered natural language interface for Mac that can view screens and take actions in apps, signaling expansion into desktop AI automation tools.
Meta integrates AI photo editing tools directly into Instagram Stories, allowing users to describe changes they want to make using natural language through the paintbrush icon interface.
Microsoft introduces Mico, an animated AI avatar for Copilot that serves as a modern, customizable version of Clippy, bringing personality back to AI assistants with expressive blob animations.
